大軍都支持

非常認同。
我諗要得到國際間既支持，大家參與呢個challenge既時候除左屌黑警同政府之外，亦用英文打段script去解釋返呢個challenge或者反送中運動背後既原因。例子如下：

五大訴求，缺一不可。Freedom is not free, please stand up for yourself!
英文script for reference (英文唔好，不喜勿插)
A young girl who volunteered herself as a first-aider during a peaceful protest on 11 Aug 2019 against an extradition bill proposed by the HKSAR government was shot in the right eye after her eye goggles were penetrated by a beanbag fired in a close range by a police officer. The girl, as a result of the shot, will lose vision of her right eye permanently.
The Hong Kong Police Force has responded that there is no conclusive evidence to prove that the shot was fired by the police officer albeit there are numerous videos, photos and statements from various presses and witnesses proving such, not to mention the beanbag found stuck in the goggles worn by the girl. Police brutality has reached an unprecedented level in Hong Kong and the basic human rights of Hongkongers are at danger. To show your support to Hong Kong, please join the “Eye for Hong Kong Campaign”. #eye4hk #eyeforhk
CS

quote.msg:
非常認同。
我諗要得到國際間既支持，大家參與呢個challenge既時候除左屌黑警同政府之外，亦用英文打段script去解釋返呢個challenge或者反送中運動背後既原因。例子如下：

五大訴求，缺一不可。Freedom is not free, please stand up for yourself!
英文script for reference (英文唔好，不喜勿插)
A young girl who volunteered herself as a first-aider during a peaceful protest on 11 Aug 2019 against an extradition bill proposed by the HKSAR government was shot in the right eye after her eye goggles were penetrated by a beanbag fired in a close range by a police officer. The girl, as a result of the shot, will lose vision of her right eye permanently.
The Hong Kong Police Force has responded that there is no conclusive evidence to prove that the shot was fired by the police officer albeit there are numerous videos, photos and statements from various presses and witnesses proving such, not to mention the beanbag found stuck in the goggles worn by the girl. Police brutality has reached an unprecedented level in Hong Kong and the basic human rights of Hongkongers are at danger. To show your support to Hong Kong, please join the “Eye for Hong Kong Campaign”. #eye4hk #eyeforhk

replies.msg:
A young female first-aid volunteer was shot in the right eye by the police in the recent pro-democracy protest in Hong Kong and her vision will probably be damaged permanently.
Despite concrete evidence showing that the girl was hit by the Police's bean bag shot, the Police still publicly denied the allegation. We believe that the Police's act of shooting medical unit did violate the Protocol II of the Geneva Conventions. To show your support to Hong Kong, please join the “Eye for Hong Kong Campaign”. #eye4hk #eyeforhk

我諗要得到國際間既支持，大家參與呢個challenge既時候除左屌黑警同政府之外，亦用英文打段script去解釋返呢個challenge或者反送中運動背後既原因。例子如下：

五大訴求，缺一不可。Freedom is not free, please stand up for yourself!
英文script for reference (英文唔好，不喜勿插)
A young girl who volunteered herself as a first-aider during a peaceful protest on 11 Aug 2019 against an extradition bill proposed by the HKSAR government was shot in the right eye after her eye goggles were penetrated by a beanbag fired in a close range by a police officer. The girl, as a result of the shot, will lose vision of her right eye permanently.
The Hong Kong Police Force has responded that there is no conclusive evidence to prove that the shot was fired by the police officer albeit there are numerous videos, photos and statements from various presses and witnesses proving such, not to mention the beanbag found stuck in the goggles worn by the girl. Police brutality has reached an unprecedented level in Hong Kong and the basic human rights of Hongkongers are at danger. To show your support to Hong Kong, please join the “Eye for Hong Kong Campaign”. #eye4hk #eyeforhk

A young female first-aid volunteer was shot in the right eye by the police in the recent pro-democracy protest in Hong Kong and her vision will probably be damaged permanently.
Despite concrete evidence showing that the girl was hit by the Police's bean bag shot, the Police still publicly denied the allegation. We believe that the Police's act of shooting medical unit did violate the Protocol II of the Geneva Conventions. To show your support to Hong Kong, please join the “Eye for Hong Kong Campaign”. #eye4hk #eyeforhk

要大肆宣傳set 一個deadline.
講明若果deadline前政府都唔回應五大訴求, 會行動升級 後果自負

用意: 先小人後君子
1)迫使政府回應
2)市民有心理準備當日會有行動
3)令市民知道當天有行動係源於政府唔回應
(令佢地明白若果政府肯回應就唔會有行動阻礙到佢番工, 出街)

1) 五大訴求
一、徹底撤回修例
二、收回暴動定義
三、撤銷對今為所有反送中抗爭者控罪
四、徹底追究警隊濫權情況, 解散、追究及重組警隊
五、以行政命令解散立法會，立即實行雙真普選
